Package com.aerospike.txnSupport

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TxnSupport  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountTransferSimulationTest  
    AccountTransferSimulationTest.SingleTransaction
    Runnable object used to support banking simulation Object executes one transaction
    AerospikeClientWithTxnSupport  
    AerospikeClientWithTxnSupport.KeyAsString
    Utility class to marshal keys into strings and back again Used as we store keys as strings when recording txn info ( used in rollback if needed ) Digest is serialized / de-serialized to ensure type information preserved
    AerospikeClientWithTxnSupportTest  
    ConsistentAfterFailureTest
    Purpose of class is to determine whether following an AccountTransferSimulationTest, the amount of money in total is as expected after rollback of uncommitted transactions Most useful if the simulation has been deliberately interrupted e.g.
    Constants  
    TestConstants  
    TransactionManager
    This class is responsible for rollback of expired transactions and release of expired locks
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccountTransferSimulationTest.AccountExistsException  
    AccountTransferSimulationTest.TestFailedException  
    AerospikeClientWithTxnSupport.KeyFormatException
    Error thrown if we attempt to convert a String to a Key where it does not satisfy the required format Runtime exception as it should not happen Expected format is namespace::set::userKey
    TxnSupport.GenFailException
    Error thrown when a Key cannot be locked due to it being locked already The id of the locking txn and the object Key are available via the Exception object
    TxnSupport.LockAcquireException
    Error thrown when a Key cannot be locked due to it being locked already The id of the locking txn and the object Key are available via the Exception object
    TxnSupport.TxnException
    Adds transaction id to any untrapped Aerospike Exceptions
